thread.title: Somalia: Delivery Is Somalia's Top Priority
thread.title_full: Somalia: Delivery Is Somalia's Top Priority

title: Somalia: Delivery Is Somalia's Top Priority
text:
Somalia: High-Level Partnership Forum to Be Held in Mogadishu 
Taking note of UN Security Council Resolution 2232 (2015) passed earlier today, both the President and the SRSG will stress the importance of supporting peace, reconciliation and political dialogue across Somalia, and the need for delivery of tangible benefits for the Somali people: delivery of public services, establishing the rule of law, eradicating al-Shabaab and ensuring Somalia¹s economic recovery. 
Guiding principles and an action plan outlining the process for reaching a workable agreement on the 2016 electoral process will be presented, along with a timetable for implementing the Guulwade Plan for the Somali National Army and a priority action list for the Heegan Plan, which aims to establish a professional, accountable police force in Somalia. Somalia
